competition_summary.context: Competition in the copper market is based primarily on price and service basis, with price being the most important factor when supplies of copper are ample. Our products compete with other materials, including aluminum and plastics. For additional information, see Item 1A “Risk Factors—The copper mining industry is highly competitive.” ​ HUMAN CAPITAL RESOURCES ​ As of December 31, 2023, we had 15,810 employees, approximately 67% of whom are covered by a Collective Labor Agreement and are repre
